analysis.narrative:
ðŸ“Š **Consensus:** Bullish sentiment dominates (83% X, 64% RSS, 100% YouTube) but structural fragility creates medium-low conviction. Market caught between institutional adoption narratives and extreme valuation/sentiment warnings.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) AI infrastructure and semiconductor supply constraints driving mega-cap tech momentum, (2) Crypto institutional legitimization vs security/operational risks creating bifurcated flows, (3) Supply-side tailwinds (Venezuela oil normalization thesis) competing against consumer demand deterioration and geopolitical fragmentation.

ðŸŽ¯ **Levels:** SPY ($691.81): Call Wall $750 (55k OI, 8.4% away - dormant), Put Wall $630 (143k OI, 8.9% away - dormant). Max Pain $687. Near support: $680 (85k OI, 1.7% - ACTIVE). Near resistance: $693 (48k OI, 0.2% - ACTIVE). QQQ ($623.42): Call Wall $641 (55k OI, 2.8% away - ACTIVE hedging), Put Wall $574.78 (116k OI, 7.8% away - dormant). Max Pain $618. key_themes: AI infrastructure momentum and semiconductor supply constraints
Crypto institutional adoption vs operational security risks
Supply-side tailwinds (oil normalization) vs consumer demand weakness
Sentiment extremes and valuation concerns at cycle peaks
risk_factors: Leverage cascade from derivatives markets and sentiment extremes at crowd greed peaks
Exchange security failures and crypto custody operational risks creating confidence erosion
Consumer demand deterioration signals (housing inventory, luxury goods weakness)
Geopolitical escalation (U.S.-China tech policy, tariff implementation)
Execution risk on Venezuela oil policy and semiconductor pricing power sustainability
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $693 resistance (48k OI, 0.2% away - ACTIVE), $680 support (85k OI, 1.7% - ACTIVE). QQQ: $627 resistance (53k OI, 0.6% - ACTIVE), testing near max pain $618
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Max Pain gravitational pull toward $687, upside capped by $730 (48k OI, 5.5% - dormant) before major $750 Call Wall. QQQ: Strong resistance at $641 Call Wall (2.8% away, ACTIVE hedging), support zone $618 max pain with deep protection at $574.78 Put Wall
